title: Gameplay Skin Bug
body: When selecting skins says an error occured. Came with latest patch 7.11 . Please fix soon

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report. We're currently tracking it. Would you be able to provide me with your leagueclient logs? 

Five logs are created per each client session, and each file will appear like this: 2017-04-21T12-00-40_17864_LeagueClient (The file name will include the time it was created - in this case: April 21st, 2017 at 12:00:40 (12PM)). 

*You can find them here:* C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs
Can I post mine? I got the same issue

https://www.mediafire.com/folder/8a5tq41ab2ik5/League_Logs
Here you go.
I don't know if uploading these on Mediafire is the best choice, if you need me to upload these somewhere else just tell me!
